name: Arellia
overview: Arellia is a software vendor for security and compliance solutions. Arelliaâ€™s founder CEO, Michael Sainsbury, was formerly the CTO of Computing Edge, which was acquired by Altiris in 2000. Michael was the primary architect behind the Notification Server technology that is today known as the Symantec Management Platform. Arellia started off in 2005 as an OEM supplier to Symantec Corp. for the Altiris Platform and became an SDK Platform Provider in 2009. Arellia offers a suite of Windows endpoint security solutions that are natively integrated into the Symantec Management Platform (SMP, Altiris). While most endpoint security solutions focus on protecting computers, Arellia has taken a different and complimentary approach as it eliminates vulnerabilities by locking down the desktop, including users, applications and platforms. Local Security Solutionâ„¢ provides centralized management and provisioning of local administrative users and groups within the IT environment. Application Control Solutionâ„¢ software provides administrators with a policy-driven mechanism for identifying the software programs running on computers under management, and controlling the running of software programs at execution. Endpoint Security Remediation Suiteâ„¢ combines the solutions listed above while adding Security Analysis Solutionâ„¢ which provides desktop compliance and remediation through assessment, deviation detection and auto-remediation to security standards.
